option3.name: EESAVE
option3.desc: Preserve EEPROM through the Chip Erase cycle

option11.name: RSTDISBL
option11.desc: Reset Disabled (Enable PB5 as i/o pin)

case1.message: These fuse settings will disable the ISP interface!

case2.message: When selecting Int RC Osc 128kHz, be sure to not divide the clock using the CLKPR register with more than 16 times. Dividing the clock with 32 times or more when using the Int RC Osc 128kHz willl make the ISP interface inaccessible on STK500/AVRISP!

case3.message: Disabling external reset will make the ISP interface inaccessible!

case4.message: These fuse settings will disable the ISP interface!
